caption.title: Prototypic network structures.
caption.p: A. Erdős-Rényi network (ER), B. Barabási-Albert network (BA), C. Watts-Strogatz network (WS). To illustrate the typical configurations, all networks have the same size (50 nodes) and they are characterized by the same mean degree (6). The rewiring probability is 0.01 in WS.
